name: Two Acting Legends Quiz | Celebrities | 10 Questions

questions.text: Rains appeared in "The Adventures of Robin Hood". What role did he play?
questions.explanation:
Prince John.

	Errol Flynn stars in this classic swashbuckilng tale of Sherwood Forest. Rains is Prince John and Basil Rathbone is Sir Guy. Olivia DeHavilland is Maid Marian.

questions.text: Rains starred as Mr. Jordan in "Here Comes Mr. Jordan". Who was the star of the movie?
questions.explanation:
Robert Montgomery.

	Montgomery starred as a man who was too-soon called to Heaven. The re-make ("Heaven Can Wait") starred Warren Beatty and had James Mason in the "Jordan" role.

questions.text: In "Notorious", how does Rains meet Ingrid Bergman (after she is "recruited" by Cary Grant?
questions.explanation:
Horseback Riding.

	Old acquaintances get renewed accidentally on purpose in this Hitchcock film.

questions.text: Rains appeared in "They Made Me A Criminal". Who was the star?
questions.explanation:
John Garfield.

	Garfield is the man on the run; Rains is the cop in pursuit.

questions.text: Rains starred as "Mr. Skeffington", but the movie was really about his wife. Who played her?
questions.explanation:
Bette Davis.

	This was another role early in the career of this huge star. Rains also appeared in "Casablanca", "Phantom of the Opera" and "The Invisible Man".

questions.text: Muni starred in "I Am A Fugitive From A Chain Gang". What crime led to his troubles?
questions.explanation:
Robbery.

	Muni ends up unintentionally involved in the stick-up of a diner.

questions.text: Muni starred in "The Good Earth". Where was the movie set?
questions.explanation:
China.

	The movie was based on the book by Pearl Buck.

questions.text: Muni starred as which of these writers?
questions.explanation:
Emile Zola.

	Muni starred as Zola in "The Life of Emile Zola", a movie based on the infamous Dreyfus affair in France. Zola took up the cause for the accused soldier.

questions.text: Muni starred as which of these famous men?
questions.explanation:
Benito Juarez.

	Muni had the title role in the movie, "Juarez". (Brando starred as Zapata in "Viva, Zapata".)

questions.text: Muni starred in "Song to Remember". The movie described the life of which composer?
questions.explanation:
Chopin.

	Muni played the instructor and mentor of Chopin. Cornel Wilde played the composer; Merle Oberon also starred.
